info.name: wsgi_wovn
info.summary: WSGI middleware for translating application by WOVN.io. A port of wovnjava.
info.html_description:
# wsgi_wovn

WSGI middleware for translating application by WOVN.io.
A port of wovnjava (https://github.com/wovnio/wovnjava).

## Install

$ pip install wsgi_wovn

## Usage

from werkzeug import run_simple
from wsgi_wovn import Middleware


def application(env, start_response):
start_response('200 OK', [('Content-Type', 'text/html')])
return [b"<html><body><a href='/test'>Hello WSGI world!</a></body></html>"]


wovn_app = Middleware(application, {
'user_token': 'IRb6-',
'secret_key': 'secret',
})

run_simple('0.0.0.0', 8000, wovn_app)
